function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of water bodies in green spaces","Impact":"Improves restorative potential and support to bird and invertebrate species","Mitigation":"Management of water bodies to prevent stagnant water and breeding sites for disease-carrying vectors","Technologies":"Bioremediation technologies for water treatment","People":"Public and wildlife in green spaces","Owner":"Park management and environmental authorities"},{"Description":"Trade-offs within animal groups due to grass cover","Impact":"Mixed effects on different animal species, creating potential imbalance in the ecosystem","Mitigation":"Careful management of grass cover to balance positive and negative effects on different animal species","Technologies":"Remote sensing for monitoring ecosystem dynamics","People":"Ecologists, conservationists, and wildlife management professionals","Owner":"Wildlife management organizations and environmental authorities"},{"Description":"Safety perception and dense vegetation","Impact":"Dense vegetation linked to lower levels of safety perception, potentially increasing risk of accidents and crime","Mitigation":"Strategic pruning and management of dense vegetation to improve visibility and safety","Technologies":"LiDAR technology for 3D mapping of vegetation structure","People":"General public and visitors to green spaces","Owner":"Local government and park management"}]}
